psitools.spellpiece.operator_compare_to_: Compares block at target position to block in inventory. 1 if true, 0 otherwise
psitools.spellpiece.operator_equal_to.de: Compares two numbers. Returns 1 if both are equal, 0 otherwise.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_direction.d: Gets the direction vector relative to the player's facing direction. 0 = Left of the player, 1 = Right.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_available_p: Returns how much psi the player has left.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_add_to_bloc: Stores the target block in a list.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_compare_to_: Compares target entity to list, 1 if match is found, 0 otherwise.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_random_bloc: Gets a random block from a list.
psitools.spellpiece.operator_block_posit: Retrieves a block position from a block.
psitools.spellpiece.selector_nearby_comm: Selects common ores in a given position.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_recall.desc: Teleports the target to the given position.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_void_block.des: Breaks block at given position and voids drops.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_cast.desc: Casts another spell in the given slot at ~80% of the spell's original psi cost.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_capture.desc: Throws a ball of psi energy that captures the target entity.
Captures the block in a psi core at the given position.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_capture_absorb: Absorb the health of the entity in a psi core.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_kill_capture.d: Kills the entity in a core.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_release.desc: Releases any entities that are stored in psi cores.
psitools.spellpiece.trick_use_potion.des: Uses the potion in target slot on list of entities.
